sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular polygon has 8 sides, and the length of each side is 6 cm. What is the perimeter of the polygon?
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a regular polygon, simply multiply the length of one side by the number of sides. In this case, the polygon has 8 sides, and each side has a length of 6 cm.

Perimeter = (Number of sides) × (Length of one side)
Perimeter = 8 × 6 cm
Perimeter = 48 cm

The perimeter of the polygon is 48 cm.
